body.raw:
{
    "name": "get-company-licenses",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses",
    "description": "Given a company_external_id return a list of licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy": "{ \"meta\": { \"policy_version\":\"1.0-ciq\" }, \"subject\": { \"type\":\"_Application\" }, \"condition\": { \"cypher\":\"MATCH (subject:_Application) MATCH (company:Company)-[rel:OPERATES|PARTNERS]->(license:License)\", \"filter\": [ { \"app\":\"app1\", \"operator\":\"AND\", \"operands\": [ { \"attribute\":\"subject.external_id\", \"operator\":\"=\", \"value\":\"$_appId\" }, { \"attribute\":\"company.external_id\", \"operator\":\"=\", \"value\":\"$company_external_id\" } ] } ] }, \"allowed_reads\": { \"nodes\": [\"company.*\", \"license.*\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"rel\" ] }}",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
    "name": "get-company-licenses",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses",
    "description": "Given a company_external_id return a list of licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy": "{ \"meta\": { \"policy_version\":\"1.0-ciq\" }, \"subject\": { \"type\":\"_Application\" }, \"condition\": { \"cypher\":\"MATCH (subject:_Application) MATCH (company:Company)-[rel:OPERATES|PARTNERS]->(license:License)\", \"filter\": [ { \"app\":\"app1\", \"operator\":\"AND\", \"operands\": [ { \"attribute\":\"subject.external_id\", \"operator\":\"=\", \"value\":\"$_appId\" }, { \"attribute\":\"company.external_id\", \"operator\":\"=\", \"value\":\"$company_external_id\" } ] } ] }, \"allowed_reads\": { \"nodes\": [\"company.*\", \"license.*\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"rel\", \"rel.*\" ] }}",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
    "name": "read-company-licenses",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses",
    "description": "Given a company_external_id return all of the licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy_id": "{{policy1_id}}",
    "query": "{ \"nodes\": [ \"company.external_id\", \"company.property.name\", \"license.external_id\", \"license.property.name\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"rel\"] }",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
    "name": "read-company-licenses",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses",
    "description": "Given a company_external_id return all of the licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy_id": "{{policy1_id}}",
    "query": "{ \"nodes\": [ \"company.external_id\", \"company.property.name\", \"license.external_id\", \"license.property.name\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"rel\"] }",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

item.name: Create CIQ Policy - Company Licenses by User

body.raw:
{
    "name": "get-company-licenses-for-user",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses",
    "description": "Given a company_external_id return a list of licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy": "{ \"meta\": { \"policy_version\": \"1.0-ciq\" }, \"subject\": { \"type\": \"Token\" }, \"condition\": { \"cypher\": \"MATCH (subject:Token)-[:IDENTIFIES]->(user:User)-[rel:CAN_ACCESS]->(product:Product)\", \"filter\": [ { \"app\": \"Token\", \"attribute\": \"subject.external_id\", \"operator\": \"=\", \"value\": \"$token.sub\" } ] }, \"allowed_reads\": { \"nodes\": [ \"product.property.name\", \"product.external_id\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"rel\" ] } }",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

item.name: Update CIQ Policy - Company Licenses by User

body.raw:
{
    "name": "get-company-licenses-by-User",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses by User",
    "description": "Given a user Bearer token return a list of companies and licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy": "{ \"meta\": { \"policy_version\": \"1.0-ciq\" }, \"subject\": { \"type\": \"Account\" }, \"condition\": { \"cypher\": \"MATCH (subject:Account)-[:IDENTIFIES]->(person:Person)<-[:EMPLOYS]->(company:Company)-[jv_rel:OPERATES|PARTNERS]->(license:License)\", \"filter\": [ { \"app\": \"app1\", \"attribute\": \"subject.external_id\", \"operator\": \"=\", \"value\": \"$token.sub\" } ] }, \"allowed_reads\": { \"nodes\": [ \"person\", \"person.*\", \"company\", \"company.*\", \"license\", \"license.*\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"jv_rel\", \"jv_rel.*\" ] }}",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

item.name: Create CIQ Query - Company Licenses by User

body.raw:
{
    "name": "read-company-licenses-by-user",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses by User",
    "description": "Given a user Bearer token return all of the companies and licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy_id": "{{policy2_id}}",
    "query": "{ \"nodes\": [ \"user.external_id\", \"user.property.name\", \"company.external_id\", \"company.property.name\", \"license.external_id\", \"license.property.name\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"jv_rel\"] }",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

item.name: Update CIQ Query - Company Licenses by User

body.raw:
{
    "name": "read-company-licenses-by-user",
    "display_name": "Get Company Licenses by User",
    "description": "Given a user Bearer token return all of the companies and licenses",
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "policy_id": "{{policy2_id}}",
    "query": "{ \"nodes\": [ \"person.external_id\", \"person.property.name\", \"company.external_id\", \"company.property.name\", \"license.external_id\", \"license.property.name\" ], \"relationships\": [ \"jv_rel\"] }",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

item.name: Get Companies and Licenses by User
